allow: Bash("C:\Program Files\Android\Android Studio\jbr\bin\keytool.exe" -list -v -keystore "%USERPROFILE%\.android\debug.keystore" -alias androiddebugkey -storepass android -keypass android)

Bash(echo "
=== CHANGES SUMMARY ===

✅ Fixed logout navigation issue:
   - Added explicit emit(AuthUnauthenticated()) after signOut()
   - Added debug logging to track logout flow
   - MainLayout will now listen and redirect to login

=== HOW TO TEST ===

1. Hot restart your app (press ''R'' in terminal or IDE)
2. Login with: bianfahlesi10@gmail.com
3. Click profile icon (top-right) → Logout
4. Confirm logout

Expected debug output:
  DEBUG AuthBloc: Logout requested
  DEBUG AuthBloc: Sign out successful
  DEBUG AuthBloc: Emitted AuthUnauthenticated
  DEBUG MainLayout: State changed to AuthUnauthenticated()
  DEBUG MainLayout: Navigating to auth screen

Then you should be redirected to login screen! ✅
")
